ï»¿UMEM2VS RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Additional Credit and Grant (Health Rapid Results) to the Republic of South Sudan The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant the Republic of South Sudan an additional credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 6,600,000 and an additional grant in an amount equivalent to SDR 16,300,000. The purpose of said additional credit and grant is to provide additional funds to supplement the financial assistance furnished by the Association under the Financing Agreement (Health Rapid Results), dated April 20, 2012, between the Republic of South Sudan and the Association. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such an additional credit and grant, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the additional credit and grant are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project in support of which the proceeds of such additional credit and grant are to be applied continues to come within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of South Sudan and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of South Sudan.
ï»¿Republic of South Sudan - 2 - Health Rapid Results Additional Financing 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project continues to merit financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such additional assistance. Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee selected by Governor for the Republic of South Sudan Acting Regional Vice President Africa Dated at Washington, D.C.
